ch.iserver.ace.algorithm.test
Interface GenerationNode

All Superinterfaces:
Node
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGenerationNode, DoNode, RedoNode, RelayNode, UndoNode
public interface GenerationNode
extends Node

A generation node represents a node that generates an operation that is sent as a request to all remote successors.

Method Summary
 void addRemoteSuccessor(ReceptionNode successor)
          Adds a remote successor to this node.
 String getEventId()
          Gets the event id of this node.
 Set getRemoteSuccessors()
          Gets a set of remote successors.
 
Methods inherited from interface ch.iserver.ace.algorithm.test.Node
accept, getLocalSuccessor, getParticipantId, getSuccessors, setLocalSuccessor
 

Method Detail

addRemoteSuccessor

void addRemoteSuccessor(ReceptionNode successor)
Adds a remote successor to this node. A remote successor is the receiver of the request generated by this node.

Parameters:
successor - the successor to add

getRemoteSuccessors

Set getRemoteSuccessors()
Gets a set of remote successors.

Returns:
a list of remote successors

getEventId

String getEventId()
Gets the event id of this node. Event ids are used to link generation events to reception events. They are kept for informational purposes too.

Returns:
the event id of this generation node
